WorkItem.Description:
This is not known to have given any problems, but for consistency records should have the full length as allowed in BIFF8, namely 8224 bytes (data) + 4 bytes record header.
 
Currently, PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 has the quirk that records are split already when data size reaches 8220 bytes.
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: 1.6.5 (and Change Set 24689)
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 maximum allowed record size 4 bytes too short
